website_summaries.verdict: Whether your main concern is your dog's size or your available space, this highly adaptable pen is a great choice.
pros: Users love the easy set-up and that the sturdy frame is almost impossible to knock over
A durable option that will grow with your pet
cons: Extra height and a pet-only door mean owners need to remove a panel rod to get in for clean-ups

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing i got the 8 panel but currently am only using six to make it smaller. Im using it for our german shepherd puppy in the mist of potty training. Alot of people including me was wondering the actual size. So im attaching a picture next to my full grown german shepherd to guide you. Please remember i dont have all the sides up that it came with
customer_reviews.author: jea

customer_reviews.title: Arrived missing the door panel - no answer from company
customer_reviews.text: Almost unbelievably, product arrived WITHOUT the all-important 8th panel (the door panel). This makes the product fundamentally useless. Contacted IRIS - the phone went to voicemail, which first said to leave a callback number and explain the issue, then notified me the mailbox was full. Nice customer support. Purchase at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Returning
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of problems with this set I hear, but I still bought it because it has high reviews. My set came with a missing pole. I used a wooden dowel from Michaels to replace it just to see if the pen was still good. After I assembled it was so weak. If anything more than 15 lbs ran at it the structure would be unstable. I don't trust this pen to hold my dog while I'm not at home. I'm going to try the square pen they have and see if it's anymore stable. I chose this brand after a lot of research so I'm really hoping their other product is higher in stability.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Bunny-approved
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and although it's taller than I expected, it works well for my very sly and strong 4# holland lop. He has a habit of picking and moving his exercise pen haha. I think I'm more happy with the purchase than him lol. If you're 5'2" and below, I suggest you use the Doggy door yourself to get inside because my tiny legs cant jump over that for easy access. Overall, very satisfied with my purchase. You even save about $40-70 compared to buying the same product 8-panels from petco.
customer_reviews.author: Ehliesha

customer_reviews.title: I actually downgraded to the 24inch size with no door and its much more sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Returned. It was very wobbly being so tall. I actually downgraded to the 24inch size with no door and its much more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: B Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Great play yard for puppies
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put together, I first purchase not paying attention to their other model that panels snap & that was horrible experience getting in & out to my tiny puppies as I have weak fingers. Did not know Iris made a yard with different snap type panel connection. Tried to use and it was painful, so went back in to find the exact same ones I’ve purchased over the last 10 years, yay I found it, panels secured with the sliding poles. So easy to get in & clean up! These play yards are great for puppies. This is my 3rd 8 panel play yard and my 1 snap panels I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Els

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for our new puppy, who weighed only 5 pounds. She jumped up on the side and the entire pen moved and changed shape. I'm afraid it would collapse on her when she gained some weight and so I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: jsamreads

customer_reviews.title: Great for younger kittens and puppies.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble and use. The pins have been loosing their caps, but we can glue them back on. Great for younger kittens and puppies. Our kittens leaned to climb these like a ladder at about 3 months old, but we still use them to partition areas of our house for our 6 month old golden retrievers. We will likely not need them forever, but I could see how they’d be great long term for smaller dogs.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and easy to put together but somewhat flimsy
customer_reviews.text: This pen is attractive, and fair for the price. We actually use it for baby goats, so we do use it on grass, but it is attractive but a bit flimsy. I think it would work wonderfully for small dogs inside, but my active large-breed puppies would no doubt knock it down quickly. I love the color, and the fact that it can't rust, but the poles that hold it together come apart very easily and the top caps that keep the metal covered come off frequently. If you have calm dogs that don't hit it likely it would be fine. For active dogs, even puppies, I think it's too light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my pups play pen. If your looking to contain a pet that's extremely rambunctious this may not work. I use it for her nap time and bed time mostly, she ashtrays in no problem. She could get out if she really wanted too. It is a bit flimsy depending in how you have it positioned. Easy to assemble, good looking and convenient. Great safe place for puppy. And a great price
customer_reviews.author: LaLa♡

customer_reviews.title: We absolutely love this product
customer_reviews.text: Omg this Pen is a must for all dogs!! I thought it was going to be short but no it is tall and can be made in 3 different sizes! We absolutely love this product!! Shipped really fast and easy to put together. The little door for my little princess is so cute and made it easier to let her out. I recommend it for any size dog/cat or any pet you just want to give space too. This is a picture of my princess (shih tzu puppy) in it. I only did the 4 panels because she's so tiny.
customer_reviews.author: krystal Flores

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome! Is awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most awesome thing ever!!!! Ridiculously simple and easy to add or subtract panels to customize the size to what you need. Disclaimer: attaching the door was annoying because you really have to use muscle and a very small screw driver. Pressing down hard on the screws as I tightened helped the process. But, that annoyance was a onetime thing, and now I have the perfect playpen for my puppy. He’s a Maltipoo and will stay small. Another customer complained about the caps on the connecting rods coming off, or being chewed off. Mine are firmly attached, so unless you’ve got a serious chewer, or a larger dog that’s bored, the caps aren’t a problem in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: valerie mangum

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I must admit when we first pulled this product out of the box I thought it would be very flimsy, but it has worked perfect for our two chihuahua foster puppies. Very easy to move around and maneuver to clean up waste. Today I actually split it up to cover both sides of a room and give them more room to run. I’m giving it only 4 stars because I do feel if you had bigger, heavier puppies (these ones are 2.5 and 3 pounds) they may knock the panels over. But I must emphasize it didn’t happen to us with these small pups.
customer_reviews.author: Sarmigru

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: I was so pleasantly surprised how nice this play pen is! It took me no time at all to put it together and it a nice size. I have an extra panel that I can add later when the puppy gets bigger. I purchased this so the puppy can play safely without me watching him every second to make sure he doesn’t get into something he’s not supposed to. I’ll add pictures to help anyone thinking of purchasing this. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: BRENDA L SOLDANO

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not quite as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The Amazon product page says that this is 63"x63". I thought that this refers to it in a square shape, but it's talking about the widest width when it's shaped as an octagon. As a square, it's 52.36" wide according to the manual (and my measurements agree with that). It's fairly stable without any additional bracing. A medium-sized dog could push it around and a large dog could topple it if they tried. Amazon ships this in it's original box. In my case, the box didn't survive the shipping process and arrived completely open. Luckily the hardware kit, which is just thrown in the box, didn't get lost, but it was close to falling out.
customer_reviews.author: AmaAddict

customer_reviews.title: Missing Part But Easy Assembly
customer_reviews.text: The box arrived already opened and, after assembling the pen, we realized we are missing an entire side panel. It still functions as a playpen but is not as large as we would have liked and we are disappointed about paying full price but not receiving the full product. We contacted customer service through IRIS and they said they are only able to send small replacement parts such as the hardware. Not ideal. Solid product if you get what you ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Hearns

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Easy to attach each panel but the door was a pain to attach as the plastic holes were way too small for the screws enclosed in the package. Ended up having to drill the holes to make them bigger but still not great. Also, the unit is not very sturdy which isn’t a big problem as my shih-Pom puppy is only 2lbs, but I would not recommend for larger breeds. I am keeping it but I would not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much! We have it configured with just 5 panels and use the other three as a separate containment gate. The rubber tabs on the bottom help keep it from sliding on the laminate floors. The door is convenient for a puppy or small dog. It keeps our 10 week old German Shepherd contained and content while allowing us to keep a closer eye on her until we have her fully house trained. It also helps keep our 2 year old German Shepherd away from her when they are being too rowdy. Great product for the price! Very pleased with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nerissa Sherrill

customer_reviews.title: I love the idea of being able to add panels for ...
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 very big dogs 100lbs.+ and they stay confined where I want them. I love the idea of being able to add panels for a bigger playpen.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: MISSING PARTS 2x
customer_reviews.text: I really want to give this 5 stars, but my delivery was missing the metal hardware for the door. Other than that, its great. It is surprisingly steady & sturdy. It took me no more than 5 minutes to put it together (minus the door hinge/latch). ** UPDATE: THIS DID NOT COME WITH IT'S METAL HINGES OR LATCH FOR THE DOOR. I RECEIVED A REPLACEMENT SHIPMENT AND IT WAS ALSO MISSING THE SAME PARTS.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianne

customer_reviews.title: .Cutest Playpen ever! I mean Princess Castle
customer_reviews.text: Love this playpen! It was difficult to change my pups pee pads because it was so tall. I cut the top off of one of the panels, cut and covered a pool noodle with material and put it on top. I also purchased PVC pipe (not done yet) to brace the top and will also cover with material covered pool noodle. Then to make sure it was sturdy added zip ties to all corners and decorated for the Princess
customer_reviews.author: yorkie girl

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, large and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, easily taken apart and good price. I purchased the green one as it was the cheapest. Not sure why one color cost less than the other colors. Even so, this is a very large pen and I no longer feel guilty when I leave my poodle puppy for 3 or 4 hours at a time. He has plenty of room to play in and seems happier than if we left him in his crate.
customer_reviews.author: michael k.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: We've used this a few times now and have had no issues. It keeps our doggie corralled like we need it to. It's pretty lightweight yet sturdy, easy to put together, and can be configured in numerous ways (panels can be added or subtracted at will to make it larger or smaller or different shapes). It stands up with no problem, and is easy to clean (our old boy likes to pee. haha). You have to disassemble it when taking it down (it doesn't fold up), but it's easy to put back together - only takes a few minutes. For the price we paid I'm more than satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jkmp

customer_reviews.title: LIFESAVER WITH AN ACTIVE PUPPY!!
customer_reviews.text: We have a 12-week-old German shepherd puppy with limitless energy. She can't have free rein of the house yet, but the crate is way too small during the day. Although we still must keep an eye on her in this playpen, it gives Lily plenty of room to play between walks. It is well made. At 25 lbs., it contains her even when she jumps up. However, as she grows and gets heavier, it won't be strong enough and she will be able to knock it down. We purchased the brown color, but it is really more like a soft burgundy. This was a great purchase and has actually restored some sanity to our household!
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Works great, our new puppy loves her new home.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, our new puppy loves her new home. We decided to get this pen because the door opens up and stays open (some have to be pushed on so little dogs and puppys would have a hard time). One thing I noticed about this pen (we tried some others) is that its much higher than the other play pens we tried. Also the door is pretty large any size dog would fit through it (our daughter crawls through it to play with the puppy)
customer_reviews.author: K. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Too much for our purposes- it went back
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our puppy as a playpen to bridge between crating and being loose in house while we are home but too busy for her. It’s okay, but it was a little too unwieldy in the spot we decided to use it in. Would rather use gates. Pay attention when assembling the door, it’s tricky.
customer_reviews.author: Lisfn

customer_reviews.title: Hard to beat!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 sets of these now. I mostly don't use them as pens, but as barriers. Two of the panels make a nice stable "v" across a doorway that I can swing to access the space and that the dog just ignores. I have a line of 4 across the arch to the family room, so we get great light and ventilation, but the dog doesn't have access. I've had one set for a long time now and it has held up well. I have used these with two 70# golden retrievers with success; equally, one of my prior dogs was an escape artist and they would have been useless, so do know your animals before choosing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these, so much nicer than the wire ex pens!
customer_reviews.text: perfect for in the house, no marks on the floors, all smooth surfaces, attractive, super simple to change the configuration...I have several, simply slide the plastic connecting rods out, add/remove panels. Only thing is that the water bottle hangers do not fit these, but bungees work great!
customer_reviews.author: firecracker

customer_reviews.title: Love this Play Pen for my Chihuahua
customer_reviews.text: I hade a different playpen for my dog in the past and it clicked to open and close it was clumsy This one is so easy with the polls and I have made it into MANY Shapes to fit my teacups needs. I have used it with all the panels and with only some of the panels. The ability to put the door opening were I want is a big plus. This is better than creating your dog as they have more room to move around. Sdhe has her food Sleeping area Potty pad and bed WE Love It.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this item. Perfect for my little dogs. Easy to use, sturdy, good value for price. I only ranked it 3 stars on foldability because it’s not really meant to be folded- easier to unpin every 2 sections instead. Not really a design flaw - it wouldn’t be as sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L.

customer_reviews.title: Great product if you have a new puppy
customer_reviews.text: Great product if you have a new puppy. We used all the panels when we set it up in the yard in the shade when we run errands We use fewer panels when we set up a pen beside our bed at night Puppies can get into a lot of trouble and cause a lot of damage unsupervised, this is so helpful until our pup gets housebroken and has a little more training Makes it so much easier on us all I am so glad we found this product
customer_reviews.author: Betty Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Like how easy it is to take it apart and ...
customer_reviews.text: Like how easy it is to take it apart and reconfigure. The little rubber tops fell off half of poles immediately. The dog can get out of the gate if you aren't carful about closing it completely. Do love how you can make it either large or small, if they would attache the white rubber tops more securely and make the closure more heavy, it would be absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L. Lunsford

customer_reviews.title: Great for ACL surgery recovery
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 65lb Boxer to use for recovery from ACL surgery. It has been a great product. Easy to set up and move where ever you need it. I would highly recommend for anyone that needs to contain a dog that can't stand to be in a kennel. Also, will be very easy to store for when I need to use again (if another surgery or with a new puppy). Money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Gary L.

customer_reviews.title: Possible choking hazard
customer_reviews.text: I'd say I really like the pen. There is one big problem. The white poles that go in have a small white cap on top. They have fallen off from my dog jumping up against the pen. They could pose a choking hazard to a dog possibly. If they fix that I'd say the pen would be 4 star.
customer_reviews.author: Cristi

customer_reviews.title: Not for big dogs, cannot tighten screws all the way down.
customer_reviews.text: Overall decent built quality, but great for our miniature dachshund. Not for big dogs! However, the screws/holes are so small that they will not tighten. I've used drills, I've hand tightened, and they will not tighten all the way down. It should not be this difficult, and the door is still loose. I attached a video to explain what I mean, I could get one side all the way in, but could not completely seat the screws on the door.
customer_reviews.author: Malachi Zeitner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect option for senior
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for senior dog! My little senior beagle stays home while I’m a work and I wanted her to have a nice place to stay besides I’m her crate. She now has space for her bed, food, and puppy pads to be comfy during the day. Set up was easy but would be best done with two people. It is a little flimsy so I would not advise for a big or rambunctious dog. It is very well suited for small-medium low energy dogs. So far my dog loves it!
customer_reviews.author: D Lee

customer_reviews.title: durable and easy to set up!
customer_reviews.text: This was a life saver for us when our dog had surgery and we needed to keep him penned. The set up is tall enough that our 70lb lab did not breach it, and sturdy enough that it stays put (it also has rubber pads on the bottom of the pen). I like how easy it is to break apart and assemble (literally took 5 minutes). We keep a 2 panel section out now to block off our stairs and our guy hasn't had any issue with it. For the price point, this beats any of the previous metal x-pen styles we've tried!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my terrier.
customer_reviews.text: This pen is larger than I imagined. My terrier mix seems to like it. I bought it for her safety and to prevent her from destroying the house when left home alone. It's sturdy and flexible. The directions were vague. There is one hole missing for the bottom plug. I don't think it makes much difference. The latch does not fit correctly but can be fixed. All over it is a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine M.

customer_reviews.title: MISSING PANEL WITH GATE
customer_reviews.text: Bought well ahead of an out of state visit (item on sale). Sat in basement for a few weeks before it was assembled only to discover a missing panel - the GATE one of course. I have larger dogs and NEED the replacement panel, but there was no info on who to contact. 301-249-2212
customer_reviews.author: Dora Jack

customer_reviews.title: Well made dog playpen!
customer_reviews.text: I love most things about this except that I have to undo all the panels each time I want to set it up and/or put it away. If I could just fold it like an accordion, I would have given it a 5 star. But overall, it is very sturdy and isn't scratching my wood floors, which is why I bought this over the metal unit that did fold, but scratched my wood floors.
customer_reviews.author: CookingGreeninSeattle

customer_reviews.title: Best doggie gate plus many other uses!!
customer_reviews.text: It also has a gate panel I haven't attached yet. Comes with 8 panels. Super easy to assemble And it moves really easy to shut off any area of your home. It's perfect to block the door way from my day care doggies 🐶🐶🐶🐶🐶
customer_reviews.author: LAquilina

customer_reviews.title: Missing item and customer support, non existent.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice 7 piece panel. I didn't get the 8th panel. I tried getting a hold of the company but they don't answer emails or their phones and the leave a message is full so can't do that. It goes back.
customer_reviews.author: Res3366

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our puppy & it was great for about 1 week! Our puppy climbed right up out of it & greeted me at the door one evening! I have bunnies & this is PERFECT for them. I still use it every day for them to come out & run around in. Great for "small" animals.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great for post-op confinement!
customer_reviews.text: This has been so helpful for my german shepherd’s recovery from surgery. She was wanting to walk around and try to get on furniture while wearing her cone of shame, and this finally helped confine her to one area. I love how easily it fits together, and i can easily move it to different rooms. Simple design for us humans, but complex enough where my dog can’t figure out how i keep opening the gate. Haha 🐾
customer_reviews.author: david dyer

customer_reviews.title: Great playpen
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a playpen that wasn't metal to take places when i ha dot take my dog and four this one, is so easy to carry and very easy to assemble.. My dog stay safe and he can't scape from it. Totally recommend
customer_reviews.author: Rafaela

customer_reviews.title: Great dog pen
customer_reviews.text: At first I did't think it was going to be very sturdy. But once it was put together it was quite strong. My new puppy loves it because she can see everything around her while she is in the pen.The suction cups could be a little stronger but it has not tipped over.
customer_reviews.author: patty

customer_reviews.title: Cute pen
customer_reviews.text: Love this playpen. It’s sturdy and tall enough for my doggy. The only complaint is that the caps on top of the rods all just fell off and leaves sharp edges exposed. My dog doesn’t try to get out of the pen but this might be a problem for dogs that put their paws up on the pen.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Grimmett

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy/ light/ handy
customer_reviews.text: Our 35 pound Corgi mix had knee surgery and we needed something for months of confinement. Simply slide a stick into slots to assemble. We've used it as a pen inside & out, as well as, easily taking a few panels off to "gate" off areas of a room. We use this in hotels for a kennel. Super light and easy to pack and go anywhere we LOVE this! STURDY! We hauled, assembled, folded, etc for MONTHS without any problems. Have metal ones too, however, this is our favorite and we use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: LeAnn Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Find a different brand
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: Changed my review from 2 to 1 star. This product is awful. I couldn't get one screw to go in all the way. They kept stripping. None of the plastic holes are threaded. After tearing my hand up trying to screw them in, I finally resorted to liquid cement to make them stick. Hopefully the door still works and this thing isn't a complete waste of money. Wrong color delivered. Also the holes for the screws in the plastic are not threaded. I gouged a big hole on my finger trying to screw in one of the screws. They are EXTREMELY hard to get in and don't go in all the way. Other than that, its okay.
customer_reviews.author: Cassi Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Good for a small, mellow dog
customer_reviews.text: My puppy figured out how to get out of this on the very first day. She used her nose to lift it from the bottom and got out. The second time she pushed against the hinge and it fell over. This is not for an active lab-mix puppy.
customer_reviews.author: J. P-HELPS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for my lab pup!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Keeps my 6 month old lab puppy contained with some space. I learned I can’t put it up again furniture as she is then able to use it for leverage and jump out. Otherwise, it keeps her contained! I only wish I could find a way for it to grip the floor better so it didn’t shift so easily. But I love it and feel better about keeping her in this versus a crate.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful your little dogs can climb this
customer_reviews.text: We have a miniature poodle and he took it upon himself to climb this playpen and jump over the top so make sure you have some cardboard around the bottom so dogs can’t climb it
customer_reviews.author: KC Wonder Woman

customer_reviews.title: They stayed in it fine. The post that hold the sections together have ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased when I was babysitting my parents dogs. They stayed in it fine. The post that hold the sections together have caps on them so that they will stay in place when you lift the pen to move it. All of them have come off, my husband glued a piece of plastic on them to keep them in place. Also I had hoped this would fold up and collapse down to a stack, but only two panels will fold into each other .
customer_reviews.author: Deb S.

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: My dog medium size. Doesn’t jump much. She loves this pen. To our surprise she goes in all the time to nap. This is easy to set up. Once up is very steady. But if you have a dog that jumps up you might have to support it. It’s nice thick material. The gate is assume. Over all great product. Well silent money
customer_reviews.author: Ozzie

customer_reviews.title: Keeps My Escape Artist Secure
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed with this pen when I opened the box. The panels are sturdy and the pen can be assembled and taken apart quickly. The door latches are very secure, giving me piece of mind when I have to leave the room. The pen is large enough to contain my 4 pound Yorkie puppy and give him plenty of room to move around and play, but would be too confining for a larger breed such as a German Shepherd or lab. I like the idea that the size of the pen can be increased with extra panels.
customer_reviews.author: Monet 7

customer_reviews.title: Really Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I use this to separate my 5 lbs yorkiepoo from my 10 lb maltipoo when I'm away or out of town because they play to rough. I also use this as a playpen for both of them when I'm in the garage working out. It keeps them safe and secure (put toys in for them to play) and allows them to enjoy the weather.
customer_reviews.author: mrstrsims1

customer_reviews.title: No parts included
customer_reviews.text: I am not too happy to receive this pen I needed which was sent to me with NO PARTS. I opened the box to discover the panels... loved the color, looked good, but thats all that was in the box. Nothing, not ONE thing that holds them together, or to install the door, nothing! Not even a packing slip. Now what? I just received it today.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Justice

customer_reviews.title: It’s the perfect size for my dog!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dog to play in during the day while I babysit during the week. I love it! Exactly what I was hoping for. Easy to assemble. I will say it’s a little too easy to push around (my dog tried it when he first got in it with ease and he is a small breed of dog-Pekingese)
customer_reviews.author: NICOLE V

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy and difficult to assemble the door
customer_reviews.text: A pain to put together. Instructions were useless too. After struggling to get the screws in to assemble the door, I decided to return it. Very flimsy and looks cheap. Not something I want in my living room. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Mel P.

customer_reviews.title: It’s awesome and just what he needs for comfort and so ...
customer_reviews.text: When our pup had to undergo surgery for a ruptured disk he was trapped in a crate just big enough for him to stand for a month, once the month hit he was allowed to move into a room sized play pen per his doc. I couldn’t find anything big enough for him to move more than 1ft until I miraculously stumbled on this huge pen. It’s awesome and just what he needs for comfort and so he’s not laying in his own pee while we’re at work!! Love this play pen!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: TINY SCREWS
customer_reviews.text: This Product would be 5 stars if they did not send the smallest Phillips screw ever made. It's the type used to put eye glasses together. Its also very tall for small dogs. You might have trouble leaning over it to place your dog in if you don't want to undo the gate each time.
customer_reviews.author: Pfalzgraf Von Zlin

customer_reviews.title: Our second order
customer_reviews.text: We just got a new puppy so we ordered another one. This set is great for a playpen but we also use them as single or double barriers inside and outside.
customer_reviews.author: CAGU

customer_reviews.title: IRIS Exercise 8 Panel Pen Panel Pet Playpen with Door
customer_reviews.text: Breeding rottweilers can really be a challenge. The panels help contain these highly energetic, fast growing puppies. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: D Everett

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this play pen!!! So nice and comfortable that even my little niece would get in and play with the puppies!!! Love the gate also and the way the sections are so easy to assemble sections just a little rod sliding into grooves unlike the other I had that I had to kill myself to open or break down. A five year old took it apart and together.
customer_reviews.author: MNadal

customer_reviews.title: Soft gray color
customer_reviews.text: Chrome is a nice soft gray color, all parts were included. Door was difficult to assemble with tool included but easy enough with a regular screw driver. Very roomy for a yorkie puppy.
customer_reviews.author: bkdvet

customer_reviews.title: It is so functional!
customer_reviews.text: It is the the best investment I ever made. It's very functional easy to assemble and it allowed the dogs to have a lot of play area the dogs have a lot of play area
customer_reviews.author: Norma Jean Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!  Worth every dime!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous for two Shorkie puppies. We use it as their inside pen. We leave the door open through the day and when they are ready to nap, the go inside. Love this pen.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Garkie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This playpen has worked great for our dog! He's a cavalier king charles spaniel mix - about 15 pounds. The sides and door are sturdy, no issues there. The panels all have rubber on the bottom to keep the pen from moving. This pen is very large! We were able to leave off two panels and still have room for two doggy beds, food and water bowls, plus room to walk around. Couldn't be happier with this purchase and the dog loves his new "chill zone."
customer_reviews.author: BJPCO

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Decent for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I liked the easy assembly though it is kinda flimsy when my puppy jumps on it; but it did work for the purpose I intended, which was to potty training my labradoodle puppy.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: to bad it not stiffer
customer_reviews.text: it works but very flimsy, to bad it not stiffer...just for small dogs and is to high in coast for what it is...
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ
customer_reviews.text: I have had this gate for about a year now and it has worked great to gate our golden retriever (now 1 year old) in it while we are gone. We started using it when we first got him at 8 weeks and now he's a beastly 70 lbs and it works just as good, has held up, and provides plenty of room. He hasn't knocked it over nor jumped out of it ever. :)
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: 8 Panel Puppy Fence
customer_reviews.text: This fence has been a huge lifesaver for us and our 9 week old Chihuahua. We use it with our puppy playpen which allows our precious pup a little more space. Aside from being so cute, it's very useful. Comes with 8 panels. Allowing you to make the enclosure bigger or smaller (only using 4 panels in the picture). Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: My Luna

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and use
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble, takes less than 5 minutes. Does what I need it to do, keeps the dog off the carpet. Like it some much I order another for our stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Perla Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and simple setup.
customer_reviews.text: My wife ordered this so I don't know the cost but it is very easy to setup and breakdown and also very durable. It is been very helpful in corraling our new puppy for those moments we can't keep a vigilante eye on them and we'll continue to use them as a secondary playpen for our rabbits.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Pacetti

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and easy to manuver
customer_reviews.text: Light-weight and easy to use panels separately in doorways, etc. My dog doesn’t jump on them, so the mere visual barrier is enough to keep him out of certain rooms or areas.
customer_reviews.author: vsalt

customer_reviews.title: All things considered, great pen!
customer_reviews.text: I have Havanese. These pens are great. The only bad thing I can say is I wish the top caps did not come off so easily. They are light weight. Can travel easily, and easy to clean. I just hose them off! Havanese can not jump over them. However, I take the gate portion off. I feel they are dangerous for puppies. If the metal does not clamp tightly, the door can be pushed open by a puppy and they could get strangled. I just put them in the garage until they are older and order 2 panels extra to replace the gate section. That's it!
customer_reviews.author: Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Super!
customer_reviews.text: The little plastic bumpers help it not to slide so much on the hardwood floors (and protects them). Boxer mix puppy from 3months old till 6 months old and still great for him.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen A.

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: So a few months ago I got a puppy and this was seriously the best investment as far as puppy stuff goes. It literally saved my sanity, and my house. It kind of slides around which I didn’t mind because it still kept her from getting into stuff she isn’t supposed to. We’re at about 3 months with it now, my puppy is massive and just figured out how to escape
customer_reviews.author: Corina

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Best training pen ever! I can move it by myself, cleans easy, had extra panels to make it bigger as puppy grew.
customer_reviews.author: Meri

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this pen for my 1 year old Golden Retriever. It's exactly what I was hoping for - the panels are very tall (he can't even stick his head over the top) so I know he will stay put/not be able to jump/climb out. The door is a little small/too weird for him, so I just don't use that panel. The panels are surprisingly lightweight, which makes for easy assembly. Overall, this was just what I was expecting so I am happy with it! The only downside is that I ordered it with Amazon Prime and it came a day late AND the box was open (luckily nothing was missing)
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Marohn

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality plastic and you can configure into a dog ...
customer_reviews.text: This is fabulous, a bit taller for those creative dogs. Nice quality plastic and you can configure into a dog run style shape. You do need a way to anchor it down because a few rambunctious pups may make it slide a bit on hard wood or tile. Velcro would prob do the trick. For out side sod steaks or snip wire hangers to 4 in piece then bend in a u shape pound in grass a few will do it!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: These are really good pens. Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: These are really good pens. Easy to put together, easy to take apart. Lightweight when taken apart in sections. Strong to keep a dog in. You can buy two to have a really big pen, and some colors cost less than others so check that out if you're looking for a bargain. We have lots of dogs, and find lots of uses for these pens.
customer_reviews.author: ibsharkbait

customer_reviews.title: Needs hardware, but otherwise good.
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this pen for two days, but so far it seems to have been a good buy. The puppy has not been able to climb out or knock it over. I would give it 5 stars, but I currently cannot use the panel with the gate as the package did not include the hinges or latch. But that should be a simple fix.
customer_reviews.author: BP0605

customer_reviews.title: Great pen !
customer_reviews.text: Love this pen. Rabbit still jumps out so I put a sheet over the top. Good quality and looks great. I love the door for easy access for the rabbit in and out at his leisure 😁
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold a 4 pound dog in
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was made for a 4 pound Frenchie. She knocks it over and gets out. It is extremely lightweight and not very durable. Extremely high priced for such low quality
customer_reviews.author: aly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Visits to the Kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to allow my dogs to hang out in my daughter's unfenced yard, under the apple tree while visiting. It is simple to assemble, easy to move, doesn't allow small dogs to tip it over. Just pull the pins and toss it in the back of the jeep. I think I will make a sort of carry case for it, just to keep it all together. The only real problem was that my grandkids thought it was for them and ended up going in and out (in and out, in and out....) the gate.
customer_reviews.author: nonsensely

customer_reviews.title: Color of Product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. Easy to put together. It came fast. The only problem is the color. I ordered the tan one shown and what I got was more of a metalic color. It will work I guess, but not what I thought it would be compared to the photo I ordered from.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L. Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Playpen for a Puppy.
customer_reviews.text: We're very happy with the Pet Playpen. We have used it with our new puppy and it works very well. We didn't use the panel with the door given space limitation, but it's super easy to add and remove the poles to access our puppy. The only negative is that the caps to the poles have a tendency to pop off which can be a problem since the puppy will put anything in her mouth and it could be a choking hazard.
customer_reviews.author: RT AZ

customer_reviews.title: Great playpen but not for power chewers
customer_reviews.text: I specifically wanted a plastic play yard for my pup because I felt it would be better on my tile floors. However, my pup chewed right through it within an hour of it arriving. Great play pen, easy to assemble and comes in an assortment of colors. Unfortunately it probably won't last long for us unless we stop the chewing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but I like this overall
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was about 6" shorter, but I like this overall. It's perfect for my 4 month old puppy (small breed dog). My husband wishes that it folded up in one piece (accordion style), because it's a pain to disassemble into 2 panel sections to put away.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Quality & Good color. Would buy again! Look super!
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up! Easy to attach our dog crate inside the playpen. Dog loves the safe zone. We added the extra 2 panles & better space. Good for small to med. dogs.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: I love this playpen
customer_reviews.text: I love this playpen! We have one in white and decided to get another one for our lake house. It is plenty large enough for our little Yorkie, to have a complete living space inside, ie.. bed, food, toys and potty pad. She is a little escape artist and this is one pen, she can't get out of. We leave the door open when when we're home for her to run in and out, and when we leave her for awhile, we feel that she's safe and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Play pen!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dog play pen I have bought! With having 8 panels you can make it any size you want. I have a 8 pound Yorkie & it works GREAT! Love, love love this! Worth every penny. Easy to put together & take apart. I store it under my bed. Light weight but very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: All pieces were there but nothing to hook the doors to the panel.
customer_reviews.text: Received it today and there’s no screws to connect the door to the panel also no instruction sheet. Shipping package was torn and there was a opening where the tape was broken. I don’t know if they were in there or not. Not satisfied at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jchoicee1

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our Shih Tzu
customer_reviews.text: Loved this so much, we bought 2! Can be used inside and out and you can easily change the size by adding or taking away panels. I like this taller one because our Shih Tzu is a surprisingly high jumper. We know he is safe when inside. It really helped with potty training too. Although he loves his small crate, he really loves hanging out and playing in his IRIS play area (we call it his "house"). It fits lots of toys, a blanket, water, food and a very happy 15 lb puppy with room to spare for activities :)
customer_reviews.author: LL Mom

customer_reviews.title: Exercise Panels
customer_reviews.text: Pros: It arrived on time, it was very easy to assemble Cons: I am using it outdoors to fence in my small dog. I would like it better if it was heavier weight. The wind keeps knocking it over. I would not purchase it again for a similar purpose.
customer_reviews.author: theresa davidson

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the IRIS kennel
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the IRIS kennel. Product is sturdy and holds up well against my Olde English bulldog who tries to get to my puppy's toys that are inside the kennel. Using the kennel outside in our garage and it is so easy to move when we need to clean the ground. Lots of apce for puppy to grt exercise inside the pen Puppy loves it and has no complaints! =)Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: 77honu

customer_reviews.title: Safety Problem With Door to This Pen
customer_reviews.text: This pen would have 5 stars except there is a big safety problem with the door. After assembly, metal pieces stick out from the side when the door is open, and the pieces are at eye level - quite dangerous for dogs that exit or enter quickly. So, I threw out the door. I am now short a panel and I have to open and close the pen the hard way. I do like that the pen is light weight yet sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: madterv

customer_reviews.title: easy to put together and gives plenty of room for ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made, easy to put together and gives plenty of room for play, feeding, sleeping and potty pad area. I purchased a cheap laminate floor to roll out underneath to protect my flooring in my house. If you aren't very tall you will have to use the doggie gate to get your dog out. I can't reach over to reach. Each joint has a plastic pen that inserts and is easily removed to open to clean the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila F. Humphries

customer_reviews.title: Great seller
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, good quality, good price. Used for my small poppy to training him pee. It works good.
customer_reviews.author: eagle

product_meta.title: IRIS 34'' Exercise 8-Panel Pet Playpen
product_meta.description: Color:Blue| Style:With DoorIRIS 34'' Exercise 8-Panel Pet Playpen with Door, is perfect for puppies, small to large dogs, and other family pets. The IRIS Exercise Pet Playpen can be utilized indoors or outdoors; the pet playpen is portable and provides 21 square feet of exercise space for pets! Each panel measures 24.6"W x 34"H; door measurements 14''W x 20''H; the distance between bars is 1.5''. The IRIS Playpen is made of durable, heavy-duty molded plastic, the playpen will last for years and will never rust! The panels interlock securely with full-length connecting rods, and the pens can be positioned in different shapes to suit your pet's needs best. Each panel features a non-skid rubber foot to protect flooring. To create a more spacious exercise pet playpen, add IRIS 34'' Exercise 8-Panel Playpen Panel Add-On, Blue, ASIN: B008V5QKO6.
feature_bullets: Provides over 21 square feet of space and easy to assemble
Perfect for training, exercise, play, or containment
Ideal for puppies and small or medium-sized pets, indoors or outdoors
Includes non-skid rubber feet to protect floors
Double-steel door latches for security, never rusts
8 panels assembled measure 63"L x 63"W x 34. 3"H, each panel including interlocking hinges-26. 3"L x 1. 5"W x 34. 25"H, door openings. 15"W x 20. 75"H

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
